snippet: Anger over Malaysia Airline’s decision to fly the Ukraine route could prove a new challenge for the government four months after another plane operated by the carrier disappeared.
abstract: Malaysians are confronted with improbable loss of another passenger jet with downing of Malaysian Airlines Flight 17 in Ukraine, only months after disappearance of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370; anger over Malaysia Airlines decision to fly route over Ukraine could prove new challenge for government, which was heavily criticized for handling of disappearance of Flight 370.
lead_paragraph: Anger over Malaysia Airline’s decision to fly the Ukraine route could prove a new challenge for the government four months after another plane operated by the carrier disappeared.

headline.main: With Grief on Top of Grief, Malaysians Are Tested on Flight 370’s Lessons
headline.print_headline: With Grief on Top of Grief, Malaysians Are Tested on Flight 370’s Lessons
